title: Pause Underperforming Ad Group
description: While reviewing a live Google Ads campaign, an account manager notices one ad group has a very high cost-per-conversion and needs to pause it.

tasks.description: Review the performance of all ad groups in the campaign for the last 14 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the performance data for all ad groups.

tasks.description: Identify the ad group with a cost-per-conversion that is 50% higher than the campaign average.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the underperforming ad group.

tasks.description: Pause the identified ad group to prevent further inefficient spending.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pauses the correct ad group.
